betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now onto the problem on Terra! Why are the Testificates folding now? What made them willing to forsake all their struggles so far, and even consider giving up to the Twilight Horde?
Facing the Experienced Cori without truly understanding Fractallites may have been a mistake. I do not even know what its power is!
Well, I now have an inkling of what it may be. The same twisting of the recursive field that was around the Experienced Cori can be now felt all over Terra. A twisting I suspect may have to do with willpower...
Me facing it, I suspect, may have pushed it over the edge, and unleashed it against Terra as a whole.
Is this being twisting the will of the Testificates? Well, I must get to the bottom of it!
